items.summary: Update the display names of all 6 loan offer cards in `frontend/src/data/loanOffersData.ts` and `frontend/src/components/TopLoanOffersBanner.tsx` to match their real lender brand names as follows: (1) https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=294173&co=358739&mt=5 → display name '24/7 Credit Loan (up to $5,000)'; (2) https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=373383&co=358739&mt=5 → display name 'Wizzay (up to $5,000)'; (3) https://www.hotloanstoday.com?id=vMWPxIKBq9DH2QsDiJNtlIkIwmcF00oXN-523fdHkCM.&subId=[SUB_ID_VALUE]&subId2=[SUB_ID2_VALUE]&subId3=[clickId]&firstName=[firstName]&lastName=[lastName]&email=[email] → display name 'Hot Loans Today'; (4) https://www.honestloans.net?id=vMWPxIKBq9DH2QsDiJNtlIkIwmcF00oXN-523fdHkCM.&subId=[SUB_ID_VALUE]&subId2=[SUB_ID2_VALUE]&subId3=[clickId]&firstName=[firstName]&lastName=[lastName]&email=[email] → display name 'Honest Loans'; (5) https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20435 → display name 'NextDayPersonalLoan'; (6) https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20370 → display name 'EverdayLoans'. Ensure all 6 offers are still distributed across the TopLoanOffersBanner and category loan offer sections, and that offers (3) and (4) continue to have [firstName], [lastName], and [email] tokens substituted via `affiliateUrlBuilder.ts`.
